subject: Notice of Assignment.
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,

The receivables of your various sellers have been financed through the RXIL TREDS platform. The details are:

SellerName{{sName}}
No. of Factoring units{{fuCount}}
Amount successfully factored₹ {{totalFactAmt}}


The factoring unit details along with assignment for all the above Sellers are attached herewith.

The Notice of assignment can also be seen by clicking the Notice of Assignment button in the Settlements->Show Breakup TAB.

{{{footer}}}
